tmp_init.tmp_t0BytesIn: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f2
tmp_init.tmp_t0BytesOut: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f10
tmp_init.tmp_t0PacketsIn: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f3
tmp_init.tmp_t0PacketsOut: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f11

tmp_command.tmp_t1BytesIn: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f2
tmp_command.tmp_t1BytesOut: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f10
tmp_command.tmp_t1PacketsIn: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f3
tmp_command.tmp_t1PacketsOut: sudo cat /proc/net/dev | grep $tmp_device | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ':' -f2 | cut -d ' ' -f11

tmp_alarmSetParameters.specificProblem: physical or logical connection to a remote router is down

tmp_alarmClearParameters.specificProblem: physical or logical connection to a remote router is up
